title: Best of The Program | Guests: James Lindsay, Sohrab Ahmari, & Burgess Owens | 10/22/20
description:
The NY Post’s Sohrab Ahmari details new evidence that Facebook is working with Chinese coders on censorship. Congressional candidate and former NFL star Burgess Owens is facing one of the closest races in the country and argues that the #WalkAway movement is working. “Cynical Theories” author James Lindsay explains how the Left has left him no choice but to vote unhappily for Trump: This is a decision between Trump and the anti-American movement behind Joe Biden.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
